definition: water intake/to obtain water (from a well etc)
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Children, in particular girls, can miss school in order to go and get water.
sentences.chinese: 儿童，特别是女孩，为了去取水可能缺课。

sentences.english: Girls enjoy the clean water from the new water points in Tianfala.
sentences.chinese: 姜法拉的一个新取水点，女孩们正在享用清洁的水源。

sentences.english: In Britain, for example, farming takes only 3% of all water withdrawals.
sentences.chinese: 比如在英国，耕作只占总取水量的3%。

sentences.english: We've been drilling for water for almost a month without success.
sentences.chinese: 我们钻井取水差不多有一个月了，还是没有成功。

sentences.english: The image shows at least two new intakes positioned just above the grille.
sentences.chinese: 在图像显示至少有两个新的取水口位置略高于格栅。

sentences.english: Bucket sand drainage installation is its key part.
sentences.chinese: 斗式排沙装置是该取水头部的关键组成部分。

sentences.english: Industry, too, needs water. It takes about 22% of the world’s withdrawals.
sentences.chinese: 工业当然也要水，这占到了世界取水量的22%。

sentences.english: Sheet pile wall is a potential structure for water-intake project of offshore power station.
sentences.chinese: 板桩墙明沟结构是海岸电厂取水工程的一种结构型式。

sentences.english: Watch where you walk to avoid crushing vegetation and take alternate paths to water.
sentences.chinese: 行走时注意避免压折植被，在取水时走不同的路。

sentences.english: People are digging wells by hand, but they hit rock.
sentences.chinese: 人们用手掘井取水，却每每挖到顽石。

sentences.english: They are much more likely than men and boys to be the ones burdened with collecting drinking-water.
sentences.chinese: 在取水时她们更可能比男子和男童有困难。

sentences.english: The steel plate boxes were applied in the construction of Heihe municipal water source intake work as cofferdam.
sentences.chinese: 黑河市水源取水口工程围堰施工采用钢板箱围堰型式。

sentences.english: That has made water drilling more costly and water contracts more lucrative.
sentences.chinese: 这使得钻井取水花费巨大，供水合同更加有利可图。

sentences.english: Minimize the number of trips to water by carrying water containers.
sentences.chinese: 使用大的盛水的容器以使取水的次数减到最少。

sentences.english: Must wash their hands before fetch water, left water in containers can not back down the well.
sentences.chinese: 取水前一定要洗手，盛水容器中的剩水不能倒回井里。

sentences.english: Analyzing the factors that influence the water quantity.
sentences.chinese: 对渗滤取水的取水量影响因素分析。

definition: to pilot a ship/to channel water/to draw water (for irrigation)
water source/water supply/headwaters of a river
to ladle water/to scoop up water
mouth of a spring or fountain
container for holding and pouring water (or other liquid): jug, pitcher, clay jar, jerry can, water bottle etc
